long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A complete clone of the original Minesweeper game for Windows

🎮 Click the icon to enjoy your games!!

🖱️ Fully use Windows XP UI style
🕹️ Exactly the same interactive experience
📊 Various statistical parameters, besides click speed, 3bv, etc
🖵 The customized resolution to adapt to large screens
👩‍💻 Open-source and ad-free

You can check the source code on GitHub
https://github.com/sheepzh/minesweeper

🎮 点击图标即可畅玩！！
